entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries beginning near midnight then changing to flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
